1484170.name: Prayerplay Order of Knowledge
1484170.description:
Explore the eerie, foggy island and use the many clues to solve the mystery of the Order of Knowledge.
You have to solve the mystery of the Order of Knowledge and understand the meaning of the fictional language.
The main character shakes his head in 2D as he explores the island, creating a magical experience that feels like you're actually walking around in 3D.

・three Rituals

Solve the riddles and recreate the three rituals performed by the mysterious Order.
・New original language.
The characters associated with the ritual are entirely new. Understand their meaning.
・Order of the Mystery
​・Angel Owel
Something bloody appears in front of you.

Story


The protagonist was studying a group called the "Order of Knowledge"that was active in the 11th~13th century.
One day, he receives a mysterious invitation to visit an isolated island near Ireland.
The place described on the invitation is an isolated island.

The island was the origin of the Order and was full of old ruins.

​Reproduce the ritual with knowledge. Then bless you.
On the island, where there is a sense of unease,
the protagonist looks at the enclosed chart and tries to recreate the rituals performed by the Order.
